hero.headline: Create Stunning Landing Pages with AI
hero.subheadline: LandingJrz helps you design and deploy beautiful, responsive landing pages in minutes. Let our AI assistant inspire you with new layouts.

features.title: Easy Content Editing
features.description: Update your landing page content anytime through our simple admin panel.

features.title: AI-Powered Suggestions
features.description: Stuck in a design rut? Our AI will suggest alternative layouts based on your content.

features.title: Fully Responsive
features.description: Your landing page will look great on all devices, from desktops to mobile phones.

cta.headline: Ready to Build Your Perfect Landing Page?
